analyzed: sapta jina stavaḥ
jagadgurum sura nara loka pūjitam kṛpā paṭum para hita mokṣa deśakam

original: vipaśyinaṃ tribhavamahaughasāragaṃ namāmi taṃ sugatagatiṃ tathāgatam || 1 ||
analyzed: vipaśyinam tri bhava mahā ogha sāra gam namāmi tam sugata gatim tathāgatam
ananta pāre bhava sāgare smin nimajyamānam prasamīkṣya lokam

original: prakāśito yena hitāya dharmo namo'stu tasmai śikhine jināya || 2 ||
analyzed: prakāśitaḥ yena hitāya dharmaḥ namaḥ astu tasmai śikhine jināya  /
vande viśva bhuvam buddham candra arka adhika tejasam
sāgara ogham iva agāgham jñānena vinayena ca
yasya indu raśmi pratimaiḥ yaśobhiḥ alaṃkṛtā bhāti vasundharā iyam
audumbaram puṣpam iva adbhutam tam vande kakupchanda mahā muni indram
visāriṇā vigata malena cetasā virāgiṇā satata hita anukāriṇā

original: hataṃ tamo vigatamalena yena taṃ surārcitaṃ kanakamuniṃ namāmyaham || 5 ||
analyzed: hatam tamaḥ vigata malena yena tam sura arcitam kanakamunim namāmi aham
pratapta cāmīkara raśmi gauram sahasra sūrya adhika dīpta tejasam
loka uttamam sarva jana abhivandyam vandāmi aham kāśyapa nāmadheyam
vākya aṃśu jālaiḥ pratibodhya lokam sūrya āśu jālaiḥ iva padma ṣaṇḍam

original: yo nirvṛtaḥ śākyamunipradīpastasmaiḥ namaḥ paramakāruṇikāya śāstre || 7 ||
analyzed: yaḥ nirvṛtaḥ śākyamuni pradīpaḥ tasmaiḥ namaḥ parama kāruṇikāya śāstre
maitreya nāmā tuṣita ālaya sthaḥ yasya eka janma antaritā hi bodhiḥ

original: utpatsyate yaḥ sugataḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvātmanā'haṃ praṇato'smi tasmai || 8 ||
analyzed: utpatsyate yaḥ sugataḥ pṛthivyām sarva ātmanā aham praṇataḥ asmi tasmai
stutvā mayā sapta jina anatīta ananāgatam ca aṣṭama bodhisattvam
yat puṇyam āsādita prameyam nirāmayāḥ tena bhavantu sattvāḥ
śrī sapta jina stavaḥ samāptaḥ
